website_summaries.verdict: If you like your hot dogs plump or bigger than the regular size, this is the unit for you.
pros: Red color looks good in kitchen
Large hot dog cage fits either 2 regular hot dogs or extra-plump dogs
Mini tongs for removing hot dogs
Makes grill marks on hot dogs for unique appearance
Fun appliance, and useful if you eat a lot of hot dogs
cons: May emit smoke during first few uses
Can burn buns along the edges
Some hot dogs may be hard to remove

customer_reviews.title: The novelty wears off very fast once you have to clean it
customer_reviews.text: It's cool as a novelty gift (my dad loved it as soon as he opened it) but it has too many design problems. Mainly, it's nearly impossible to clean. Plus, it doesn't cook the hot dogs properly. Most of the time, it overcooks the outside while the inside remains cold. The only way we've gotten around this is to cook the hot dogs twice on the lowest setting. Not great. I got this for my dad in December, and since then, he's only used it a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I have had burnt smashed buns come and the burnt bread stays stuck to the metal and is not fun to scrap off
customer_reviews.text: It usually takes 3 times before the hot dogs are done, you have to keep turning them and put them in the opposite way to make sure they get done evenly. And the buns..... I have had burnt smashed buns come and the burnt bread stays stuck to the metal and is not fun to scrap off. I now just warm the buns up in the microwave, so not worth all the worth for a toasted bun. :( I think it could be an awesome product, I just ended up with a clunker! :(
customer_reviews.author: Jezebel L

customer_reviews.title: Just a novely
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks very nice, if you are in a hurry, use the microwave. After several attempts it took 2 full cycles of nearly 8 minutes each to get a fully cooked dog. The bun toaster section is really too small to fit the bun in properly and if you don't watch it they can get burned somewhat. Seemed like a nice idea at the time but really just a novelty and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RWL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tastey hot dogs , be careful its 120 v AC . Not universal. Otherwise very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Hamieh

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, the weather where I'm at is still really cold and it honestly snowed yesterday! I was going to grill some hot dogs when I remembered that I bought this a little bit ago and had yet to try it out. It works like a charm. They are however right that it does smell like gross plastic smoke the first time I used it, but the hotdogs tasted amazing. I even love that they added a bun toaster too! I might just pick this instead of grill way more often from now on. It doesn't require set up and I get to have a nice toasted bun with it. Mmmm weenies.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Hall

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.text: First time out of the box. I followed the directions and when it was time to eat, one of the rolls was black around the edges and cold in the center. The other roll had to be pulled out in about 20 pieces because it was stuck in the tube. The hotdogs taste pretty good, they do cook nicely. When I saw this product I thought "Great, I'm stuck working from home until January and now I can use this for a quick meal or snack. I guess that might work if I purchase twice as many rolls as hot dogs. I'm disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Wilkikns

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, awful execution
customer_reviews.text: Requires at least two cycles to get meat hot in center. Fits the smallest of buns and hardly anything larger. Great concept, awful execution. And I even had the first one I was sent replaced. Second is a little better but still 2+ cycles is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Inspektor 27

customer_reviews.title: You need to flip the hot dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job in the end, although the hot dogs go too far down for the end that lands on the bottom to heat properly; this uneven heating means you have to pop them up partway through the cooking cycle and flip them over to get both ends done. Stopping them just a couple inches higher up could've made for a much better product. Other than in the fact of being a toaster designed for hot dogs, something not seen in every household, this item does not really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: David Roland Cantor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to love this product....it burns the buns, and burns one side of the hotdog. I have tried different settings, but sadly, it's just not a good product. It is more of a hotdog warmer and bun burner.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Very decorative, but will it last?
customer_reviews.text: Internal parts look flimsy so don't know how long it will last. Doesn't truly cook hotdogs fully so suggest you use fully cooked ones. Looks very nice but has bad odor and smokes first few times it's used so I have to wonder how healthy that is? The up side is that you get two hotdogs that have been microwaved or boiled! Yuck! Since I don't want to be outside in winter snow grilling hotdogs I will use it and hope it lasts awhile. I would supervise it while it cooks just for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: runhot

customer_reviews.title: POS.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute...One side of bun holder wasn't on clip. The first time I used lever to toast, they became stuck, wouldn't come up. We had to pull them back up. Poorly put together...Loved the idea. Kids were excited. Meh. $ 19.00 lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Welp.

customer_reviews.title: Neat hotdog toaster at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This hotdog toaster is pretty neat. This is a great alternative if you dont want to cook hotdogs on the grill or over a campfire. I would suggest toasting at the 3 setting first so you dont burn the hotdog buns, then remove the buns and continue cooking the hot dogs on the 2 or 3 setting or until the hotdogs are cooked to your liking. The only thing i didnt like about this product is that it feels kinda like its cheaply made and the hot dog holder moves around in the toaster which at times can make it become wedged.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cropek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I like that its not greasy like microwaving. And it dont take as long as stovetop. I also really love the toasted buns. It does burn the sides of the buns that touch the metal but it dont bother me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life is Full of Disapointments
customer_reviews.text: Bad news, Pikachu. I bought this hot dog toaster with a twinkle in my eye and a song in my heart. Listen: the holes are too small for the bread. You put the bread in and it burns. The hot dogs? Opposite problem. They jostle around and cook all weird. I want to like this thing. I want this to be a one-stop hot dog heaven. It's not. Two stars because the hotdogs still taste better than they do out of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my 18 year old brother because his favorite meal is hot dogs.I liked how”vintage”it looked and it came in his favorite color.The only problems it had was that its hard to clean,and also it burns the bread just a little bit so he said leave the bread in for 15 seconds
customer_reviews.author: cynthia palacios

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog toaster
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been my whole life? LOL I love this little hot dog toaster. Actually my husband eats more hot dogs then I do and he was always over cooking them on the grill and burning my pans in the house..and I seen this and had to try it. One of the best things I have bought so far off Amazon. It works great..and husband uses it a lot. He is happy and I am happy. No more over cooked hot dogs. I highly recommend this hot dog toaster. You will love it also.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Lahniers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kid or adult with disabilities
customer_reviews.text: Fun way to teach independence for kids, teens, or adults with cognitive disabilities. Bought for my adult brother who has some learning disabilities & has difficulty with everyday “adult” tasks. This has given him some independence & he loves using this! He does sausage & hotdogs in this. It’s safer for him than using a grill, oven, or stove.
customer_reviews.author: becky garthwaite

customer_reviews.title: ... but now he is obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for his birthday and he thought it was a gag gift and wasn't as excited as I thought he would be... but now he is obsessed with it. He used to cook hotdogs in the microwave for lunch on the weekends and they weren't as good as a cooked hot dog. Now he uses this and gets a toasted bun and everything is perfectly cooked. It is so cool that it can cook your hot dog and toast your bun without one of them being overcooked/undercooked. Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie NelsonTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, flames came out after only having for 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Unsafe. Had since feb 28 and has smoked some. Wife went to use it today and flames came out. Steer slear and buy something nkt liable to burn your house down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Breidigan

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, slightly lacking in practicality and execution
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted to take this to work so i could have an easy lunch. The problem is it heats up the outside fast so microwaving before putting in the toaster would be best for thorough cooking. First time i tried the bun toaster it burnt the bread and i realized the design flaw that basically makes the bread toaster unusable. Overall the design is cool looking, and as long as you don't mind toasting your buns elsewhere, this is pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: So far the kids and I love this thing! It does exactly what it says. Also looks good sitting in the counter with my Coke stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am, I do not eat green eggs and Ham

customer_reviews.title: Neat and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty neat. It cooks two hotdogs and toasts two buns in the same way that a toaster works. The only complaint is that the bun slots are not big enough to fit most hotdog buns we have found. Part of the bun will actually touch the sides, thus burning the edges. Other than that, this little machine is really neat and very convenient. Allows my daughter to safely cook two hotdogs without the need of help from a parent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: What a great find and price with quick delivery! Put hotdogs n buns in, 5 mins. later WALLA!! Ready to eat. Cooked perfectly hotdogs and buns.. don't hesitate, you'll love it. After a long day, coming home hungery and wanting something quick n hot that hits the spot. This is it! No mess. No fuss.. no muss ENJOY!!! >^.^<
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: The handle will not stay on the ON position.
customer_reviews.text: The handle will not stay on the on position. I have to sit there and hold it while the dogs cook. It does not cook the dog evenly or the bread evenly but it does toast them. It cooks the front and back of the dog but not the sides. I wish they worked and that they came in different colors. I purchased a sticker to put on the side of this toaster to give it little bling and the sticker cost just as much as the toaster. Should of tried the toaster before adding the sticker otherwise I would of returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marky

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog!
customer_reviews.text: Likes: cooking time is fast and it’s very easy to use. Hot dogs are hot when done, buns are crispy. Meh: cleaning isn’t fabulous but isn’t hard either. Buns do not fit well, the edges tend to burn. They need help going down once the lever is pushed. Now since this is my only complaint, we’ll I think that’s ok. No dislikes. I recommend this fun little item.
customer_reviews.author: A & M Ellestad

customer_reviews.title: ... want it for a conversation piece or a decoration fine but if you think your going to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want it for a conversation piece or a decoration fine but if you think your going to get a great hotdog from it with a warm bun you will be disappointed. Boil,grill or microwave
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crunk

customer_reviews.title: I hate the idea of hot dogs but out daughter loves them and can ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a toaster, not a magical gourmet substitute for actually grilling. I hate the idea of hot dogs (but there's some fairly decent options now, but out daughter loves them and can make her own 2 minute dinners after late nights at sporting events, and, well, they are pretty good toasted bun and decently heated hotdogs in this toaster oven. What do you want for $20, as it's way better than nuking them and putting in a cold bun. I imagine she'll want to take it off to college, as she really likes it a lot, and it's cheap and easy and, therefore, I give it 5 stars for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: sporting road

customer_reviews.title: Find another way to cook your dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Used it long enough to murder a pack of rolls and hot dogs. They cannot be inserted at the same time. Either the hot dog burns (and explodes), or the hot gets only lukewarm and the bun toasts poorly. Not worth the aggravation. I imagine a person of more patience than I could manage the learning curve needed to master this gizmo, but I haven’t the time. Good idea, cute retro design, ooor execution
customer_reviews.author: bigwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog toaster is a replacement that I'd had forever (and much more expensive) and that my grandchildren love for their lunch when they visit. This works perfectly. I use Hebrew National and they cooked thoroughly at the 5 setting. I wasn't able to fit our Ball Park buns in the toaster and will follow another reviewer's recommendation to try a smaller bun. This toaster was an excellent value, works as it should, and the color matches my kitchen and is bright and cheerful. I had no issues with smoke or smell so I can't comment on that concern.
customer_reviews.author: San Gabriel Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for lazy young people!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the greatest appliance I have ever owned, and I recently purchased an instant pot that I'm pretty happy with so you know I'm serious. It's so convenient and easy to use. Takes less than 5 minutes to cook 2 long Hoffman hot dogs and toast the buns at the same time, almost as good as having them on the grill in summertime. Also, I don't have kids but I would imagine this being perfect for a busy family because it's so easy I think a responsible enough 7 year old could do it on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cool kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: It does cook the hot dogs and bun perfectly. HOWEVER I don’t recommend using specialty items like polish sausage or hot dogs with cheese inside. It’s a bit messy. Also, you can’t use sausage buns. I wish the bun capacity was a tad big bigger for “good” buns. You can only buy those smaller buns otherwise you have to cram them in and pulling them out is a nightmare. They provide a tong, but that’s only beneficial for pulling out the hotdog and not assisting with pulling out the bun. Too big of buns and it just rips apart.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nine-year-old birthday because she loves hot dogs and pickle relish she loves it you put the bread in very last you have to let the hot dog cook for a couple seconds let it pop rotate the hot dog and then cook it for another couple seconds for to be evenly cooked all the way around .. very easy to use perfect birthday Christmas present for people who love hot dogs
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bun always burns! The slot doesn’t seem big enough. I have tried buying the smallest hot dog buns that I can find but they burn anyway. The wiener itself comes out okay.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Hot dogs!..get your hot dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little hot dog maker...It is easy and adds more joy to eating and making your hot dogs!.. How can that be possible! It would make a great gift for the hot dog lover...that was ..is me! It's easy to use...and fun...good conversation piece too.it really works well..buns cook and hot dogs cook up...just add your favorite topping! In minutes
customer_reviews.author: Paula Who?

customer_reviews.title: It looks better than it cooks
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to try my Retro Hot Dog toaster, BUT....It looks better than it cooks. My hot dog buns stuck to the sides and the hot dogs never cooked thoroughly. Tried different hot dogs and buns but the buns stick so bad you have to scrape them out. Great idea though. Needs lots of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was terrible too. It was delivered to me without a ...
customer_reviews.text: Defective. I bought this as a gift and just was told it doesn’t work. The hotdog barely got warm and the bun opening is too small to accommodate anything slightly bigger than small buns. The packaging was terrible too. It was delivered to me without a box. Instead shipping label was slapped on outside of product box. Terrible all around. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: LeA

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy With Hotdog Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use my cute hot dog toaster, but it was not the experience I expected. The buns did not fit easily into the slots, the bun edges were blackened and the hotdogs (ballpark) were crispy down the front but not that hot on the inside, just ok. I set it on five following the advice of some of the previous reviews. It required cleanup after an unsatisfactory experience. I have not used since. If i didn't have to pay return postage I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: SAGOOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 yr old son for his birthday since he loves hot dogs. It's a great idea for cooking hot dogs. I just wish the quality was a little better. The lever you push down to toast the hotdogs is very flimsy and you have to push it right in the middle or it feels like it's going to break. The hot dog holder insert also gets caught when it pops up. I toast the hot dogs 2-3 times and flip it each time. If the quality were better I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking and takes 2 passes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea, and use mine in the office for a snack between projects. I will say that you will probably scorch your hotdog buns and have a cold hotdog. I recommend 2-pass cooking, and of room-temp hotdogs. Cook hotdogs only first pass at 4, and put buns in and cook all at 3 after a brief cooling.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Little

customer_reviews.title: The coolest appliance ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to purchase the Grill cheese maker next! This product is the coolest way to get fresh cooked hots the way you get them from the movies or at an event. they come up hot, cooked and plump! Even works well with BRATS!! the Buns are toasted too..We had make your own coney dogs and it took less than 5 minutes to make your coney!! wooohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Clint & Tez

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this retro hot dog maker. I have a picky child and making meals is frustrating. My son loves hot dogs and this is so easy to use. While I'm cooking a meal for my husband and I, all I have to do is put in a hot dog and bun and let this hot dog maker do its thing! The taste of the hot dog is so much better than cooking it in the microwave (which in my opinion is disgusting!) It's light weight and can easily be stored in a cupboard when not in use. You can't beat the price on Amazon either! Definitely worth it for kids that love hot dogs (or adults!)
customer_reviews.author: N. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons below
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Looks nice - hot dogs heat up quick on the 5 setting Cons: - Burns buns even on medium heat - Even smaller buns have to be squeezed in - power cord sticks out the front where the lever is, it's just ugly - I have a toaster oven why didn't I just use that instead? - $20 and (hopefully) a lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Noble prize winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for granny. She loves her hot dogs. She thinks this machine is the best invention since sliced bread. The price was a little below what the stores were asking but I would have paid more. Granny is thrilled and for the look on her face it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bogusprofilename

customer_reviews.title: Missing Inside Basket
customer_reviews.text: Just completely wasted my money! Bought this for my dad for his birthday, only for him to tell me that the basket for the inside was not included in the box, therefore, it’s completey useless. Complete waste of money. I’d be content on someone contacting me to send me the basket for the inside or sending me a replacement machine with all of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Burns everything
customer_reviews.text: All the different buns I have used have burnt where it touches the wall. And the hotdog 🌭 stick the thongs that come with it don’t work well
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Perez

customer_reviews.title: This is an OK gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I find the buns tend to stick to the toasting elements. It's OK for a quick lunch or dinner. I could have lived without it, but I'll use it since I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Dal Santo

customer_reviews.title: Not disappoint it
customer_reviews.text: Toast good the buns but if you don’t adjust the meter hot dogs can stick to the metal on the toaster. Anything else is fast and good
customer_reviews.author: Rubiol@

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. And it is great
customer_reviews.text: Got this toaster because I like hot dogs. This is great it is easy to toast the dogs instead of cooking in water. Easy clean up and no mess! The buns got a little brown around the edges, but didn't burn. Glad that I got this. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Fast Hot Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cook hot dogs in this toaster. The buns do not fit in the sides though which makes not so convenient, I have to toast the buns on top. I have tried several brands and even the smallest one I found did not fit, I dont' know what buns you're supposed to use to fit in this. The cradle for the hot dogs does get black easily and can be tough to scrub off or maybe it just needs a woman's touch. Retro design is nice on this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dog Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is SO cute!!! Our family decided we would do “White Elephant Gifts” for Christmas this year. As I was scanning Amazon for a good gift - I ran across this and thought it was perfect! Who doesn’t like hot dogs? 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know what to expect
customer_reviews.text: Come on who needs this? It's fun to use, though. It doesn't handle ball park buns--you need to smash them down a bit to make them fit. Even then it really only crisps the edges. I used budget dogs to try it out, and it cooks them decently at 4 minutes. It's like eating a hotdog you rolled around a pan for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Guy That Buys Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Fun appliance, but not practical
customer_reviews.text: This was a very fun item for my household. We found that it was just an extra appliance we really didn’t need so I gave it away. If you are a person who loves hotdogs and find that you’re constantly making them then this appliances for you!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMcPatriot

customer_reviews.title: Was broken wehen we received it!
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the first one was broken when we received it button wouldn’t stay down to cook.. Received a replacement but haven’t tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money 😐
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it cooked the hot dog even though it took a couple of cycles to get the hot dog cooked well enough. The bun on the other hand was a disaster. It does not fit buns well at all. I had to shove the bun down into it and this squished the bun and the bottom of it was burnt and the top of the bun was left untoasted. Product could use a little overhaul.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for weiner lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gag gift for my boyfriend and turns out to be awesome. I never realized how annoying it is to boil and then grill the natural hotdogs we get from a local business. This nifty machine grills both the weiner and the bun in less than 2 minutes. The retro style supringly brings a cute homely feel to our modern kitchen. I have also started using it for bagels (just have to cut it in half for them to fit in the bun slot) instead of using the broil setting on the stove. Versatility, yay!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Hot diggity dog brand was much better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Hot Diggity Dog brand hot dog cooker and this does not compare. The hot dog buns barely fit in the toaster and they stick to the sides and burn on the edges of the buns. The weiners don't get very hot but if you up the heat the buns burn more. I wish they still made my old brand because this is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Catkeeper88

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life ???
customer_reviews.text: What a beaut !! I seriously can't express how much I love this toaster. Literally everyone should own one. It only takes a couple of minutes to cook/toast them up and they taste like they just came off the grill. Don't believe me? Then try one for yourself. You will be in love too. You'll see.
customer_reviews.author: DaGoat Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my college student as a gift. When he used it for the 1st time it set off the fire alarm in his Apartment. He called me and said "mom I can't use this, I'm bringing it home." He also said it was extremely hard to take the buns out of it. I want to return it but he's so far away and does not know how to ship it back from where he's at. Ugggg!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Retro Hotdog Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a present for my nephew and it was awesome! I was nervous that it wouldn't cook the hot dogs properly or that there would be some other issue but it ended up working great. The heat mechanism is in the middle so it thoroughly cooks the hotdogs and the buns get the outer heat which is exactly what most people want. The retro look really holds up and is an awesome addition to a kitchen. Fast shipping and product came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Loladex

customer_reviews.title: Great with hot dogs, mediocre for buns.
customer_reviews.text: I cooks my hot dogs perfectly! Nice, evenly browned. It does a mediocre job toasting the buns, though. The edges touch the heating surface, so the are almost burned while the rest of the bun is barely toasted. I have started to use larger bratwurst buns, separating the halves to toast, then cut my hot dog in half to make the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Caddell

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful for certain people!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little product. Hot dogs are super easy to make as it is, and this is a 'superfluous' product, but for my disabled daughter, this is a really helpful item! Put hot dogs in on the highest setting, and put in the buns halfway, or take them out early--otherwise they'll burn. The hot dogs come out the most 'well done' on the highest setting, with just a tinge of char. The grease trap works well, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melo

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia HDT600AQ Pop Up Hot Dog Toaster
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves coming over to my house, and helping me make hot dog's for super.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hyl

customer_reviews.title: Most important was that it actually cooked the hot dogs the way I liked.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient way to make just two hot dogs without a mess. I love my hot dogs really well done, so, I just popped it down a couple of times to get the hot dogs like I liked. Love this appliance. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and less than $20!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this because I hate boiled, water-logged hot-dogs and the microwave has a tendency to leave cold spots unless I over-cook them. I do like my Ball Parks a little more cooked then others so I do one cycle on 5 and then another on 2 and PERFECT! Only problem I have with mine is it was missing one of the rubber "feet" on the bottom. If not for that, I would have given this little baby a 5 star. It is exactly what it says it is and for under 20??!! If I can get some replacement feet, I'll edit my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Banholzer

customer_reviews.title: Dinner is (Easily) Served!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and functional product that makes life easier for me when I’m out or just don’t have time to prepare something. It’s the convenience of a toaster with the hot dog twist that makes it easy for all family members to use and you can regulate the degree of “doneness” for the hot dogs and the toast so it’s a winner for my family!!
customer_reviews.author: LCarol

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who loves hot dogs and honestly it is a waste of money The old fashion franks will not fit into it It breaks the buns and burns the sides of them
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jollotta

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even $5-10. You can do better hot dogs in your microwave
customer_reviews.text: Returning this ptoduct. Tried it, only the smallest bun fit in and also may need to be pushed and pressed in holes. Buns burned on sides, and the burned stuff was so hard to wipe/clean from this hot dog maker, so I wasnt able to clean completely, returning the way it is after one use. Got it today, will drop for return tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Its a Childs toy really.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor construction was expecting better quality but it seems things from that site are just well novelty items. Its like there cheap plastic nock-offs of the real thing IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Deaton

customer_reviews.title: DINNER MADE EASY!!
customer_reviews.text: This was part of my nephew's housewarming gift. He just bought his first condo and doesn't do my cooking. We got him the hot dog maker and a milkshake machine. He's all set to go.
customer_reviews.author: Norma W.

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Autistic son LOVES hot dogs . He struggles using the microwave to warm them up. When I seen this, I had to buy it for him. He can pop them in and be done. He is THRILLED with it. The tongs help A LOT for it to not burn his hands. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: BritKris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I so excited to try this thing out! I was hoping it would be awesome? Nope! Cheaply made! It worked good the first time then the buns got stuck and would burn:( the hot dog holder inside the device has no track to follow and often gets stuck also. The top of the machine gets super hot and should not be left unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin s Takatsuka

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it if you love hot dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this over and over, my grandpa loves hotdogs and has gone through 4 of these toasters. He loves them a lot. With that being said we have had to buy 4 over 6 years. He also uses it way more than the average person would haha.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Baron

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My dad is obsessed. Reminds him of the 60s when he was growing up and would go to a drug store and get a hot dog and a malted shake. Cant beat the price and the hot dogs are great. Just be weary that you need normal sized franks for this thing to work properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used about 5 times and then it quit working properly. Even when it did work, it would burn the buns in spots. Hot dogs would be burnt in spots and undercooked in others.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gable

customer_reviews.title: A must have for hot dog lovers
customer_reviews.text: A must have for hot dog lovers! This was an amazing Christmas gift. Just be sure to get the regular split buns, not the split top. Easy to use and clean. Great when you only want to make 1-2 hot dogs and toasted buns. Almost jealous I didn’t get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Very good for its price
customer_reviews.text: A quick way to make hotdogs with out fryimg them. To be honest it Tastes a lot better than frying them and the bun toster is just another Plus to this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Murad

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Every year my dad wants chili dogs for his birthday and when I stubbled across this I had to get this for him. He has used it a few times and said it works pretty well. Toasting the bun is a good feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product
customer_reviews.text: Ever get home from work or school feeling tired and hungry but you do not want to make anything? Well this bad fella solves that problem for you. Simply place two weiners in it with the buns and boom boom boom you got yourself an early dinner.
customer_reviews.author: beecher

customer_reviews.title: The openings for the buns are too small. It ...
customer_reviews.text: The openings for the buns are too small. It just burns the buns around the edges. And they get stuck. It also doesn't really toast the hot dogs. It just heats them. Don't buy this if you're expecting toasted (aka slightly browned) hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Cute hot dog cooker
customer_reviews.text: The cooker is very cute but the quality of the product is lacking. It did cook the hot dogs but the bun warmer is a little small so the edges of the bun burned.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style. Haven't had the opportunity to use it yet, but it was received safely, carefully double boxed and intact. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Melby

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wanted this!
customer_reviews.text: We play a game to exchange white elephant gifts every year for Christmas with my family and everyone wanted this! My sister and her family ended up getting to keep it and they love it! My brother-in-law said they’ve used it several times and the hotdogs and buns taste great!
customer_reviews.author: CGK

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product! Will set off the fire alarm the first few times you use it but other than that it gives you the perfect hotdog cooking experience!
customer_reviews.author: Lacie L

customer_reviews.title: This thing really rocks
customer_reviews.text: My new fav toy to play with for late night snacks, lazy sundays and general shennanigans... goign to start giving them as gifts at weddings
customer_reviews.author: robert shaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - a few cooking tips
customer_reviews.text: We really like making our dogs in this. It takes a few tries to work out the kinks though. We put the hot dogs through one cycle with control on dark and then add the buns for one cycle n medium. Also, you may have to flatten the buns with your palms before adding. The perfect design would have made the bun slots bigger.
customer_reviews.author: TreetopNTn

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Your hotdog gets roasted good. The bun gets a little over done for me, but my husband likes the way the bun comes out
customer_reviews.author: donna lee

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: it cooks the hotdogs really good, but even small buns you have to literally smash to fit them in the toaster part and if u put them in same time as the dogs, their gonna burn..i find its best to wait & put them in after dogs r done & keep the buns in a few seconds to warm them..its a good deal though..
customer_reviews.author: Ahmya N tsakalos

customer_reviews.title: Creates grill marks!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for Christmas and he really likes it!! Uses it all the time. The only thing is it is made of thin metal, the kind that clangs in the box, so may be of cheaper material than expected. It does work as expected though and creates grill marks on the hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: makes dinner fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old daughter bought this with one of her birthday gift cards. She likes that she can just pop two hot dogs and buns in and lunch or dinner is ready in a few minutes. Just be ready when they are done though because the buns come flying out when they pop up!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeemoose

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: It's great and fun. But the buns won't fit opened up. and you have to be careful as instructions say pop the buns up sooner than the hot dogs or they will get burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute but would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The buns don’t toast well. The hotdog cooks and the bun just burns on the sides. Cute but would not recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hotdogs with easy function
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does what it needs to do which is make hotdogs real quick it’s easy to clean. I took it to work for a meeting and everyone was able to have a hotdog. A lot of my coworkers ended up ordering this product and we have one now permanently In our break room!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: The buns tend to burn on the edges. It did not meet my husband’s approval. He likes them grilled. I gave it to our neighbor with children. It did clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Zientek

customer_reviews.title: Nice, can't complain for this price
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, buns will burn before the hotdogs are done though. Not real sturdy, seems a little lower quality but for this price, i'm pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Ok - does the job
customer_reviews.text: Have to do em twice in high to cook em good. Crispy skin !! Bun toaster .. meh. I quit using that feature, buns get stuck crunches up etc. looks good. Like a mediocre toaster in quality. Sad because I really like it but wish it was built better.
customer_reviews.author: Krispy

customer_reviews.title: I don't know where this has been, but YES! It is the best since the invention of the hotdog.
customer_reviews.text: Quick lunch, and I had never thought of a toasted bun, but here they are. I just wish we had more kitchen space lol. I don't think there is any way to convey the handiness of this thing. If you buy one and understand. Then hit me a thumbs up. I know you are going to be convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Munn

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dog for hotdogs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine. It smoked the first time we used it but we had a heads up on the smoking issue so no unpleasant surprise! Wish it would produce just a little more heat but it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cooks hot dogs perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my hot dog toaster. Remember to let it run thru a cycle first. It will smoke alittle (like any appliance when u first use it)...then it is primed and ready. It cooked our hot dogs perfect. I bought it for the hot dog king! He said it's also a great product. I don't leave the buns in as long as the dogs. I set it on setting 4= perfect!! U can tweak it to your liking😉
customer_reviews.author: SingingAngel

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for Christmas. We used it a couple times for fun. It burns the bun every time & it's not easy to clean. The hotdog cookd ok, but the product gets super hot. It's really easy to get burned.
customer_reviews.author: TRob

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: love it. Cooks delicious hot dogs and toasty buns. Fun for kids to cook their own, snd even adults find it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette H.

product_meta.title: Nostalgia HDT600RETRORED Pop-Up 2 Hot Dog and Bun Toaster With Mini Tongs Works with Chicken, Turkey, Veggie Links, Sausages and Brats, Pack of 1, Retro Red
product_meta.description: Color:Metallic Retro RedThe Nostalgia HDT600RETRORED Retro Series Pop-Up Hot Dog Toaster is great for entertaining and as a fast meal solution for the whole family. The large hot dog cage fits two regular-size or extra-plump hot dogs. Adjust the heat setting to cook hot dogs to your preference. Easily remove the hot dog cage and use the included mini tongs for removing the hot dogs.
feature_bullets: Great tasting hot dogs: Toasts upto 2 delicious, regular-size or extra-plump hot dogs and two buns at the same time. Cord length: 34 Inches
Adjustable settings: Adjustable toasting timer and stop toasting button allows you to toast your hot dogs to your preferred doneness
Hot dog cage & tongs: Keep hands safe when removing hot dogs by using the included hot dog cage and mini tongs
Drip tray: Slide out the drip tray when done toasting for easy cleaning
Cord wrap: Wrap the appliance cord underneath the base of the unit for tidy storage
Works with other dogs: Also works with pre-cooked chicken dogs, turkey dogs, veggie dogs, sausages and brats

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars4,703 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
